questions.question:
Topic: 1.1 Ingest and store data.

A company wants to read, write, and transform Apache Parquet files from an Amazon S3 bucket. An ML engineer has been asked to automate this process by creating a custom transform script in Python.

Which solution meets these requirements with the LEAST operational effort?
options: A\nCreate a workflow for processing by using Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow (Amazon MWAA). Create a Python script by using PySpark.
B\nCreate an Amazon EMR cluster for processing. Create a Python script by using the EMR integration with PySpark.
C\nCreate an AWS Glue job for processing. Create a Python script by using the AWS Glue PySpark extension.
D\nCreate a workflow for processing by using Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow (Amazon MWAA). Create an AWS Glue transformation from Apache Airflow.
correct_answers: C\nCreate an AWS Glue job for processing. Create a Python script by using the AWS Glue PySpark extension.
questions.Source: Official Pretest: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate
questions.Practice test: Official Pretest: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate
